product_name: CamelBak Lobo Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The narrow and streamlined CamelBak Lobo hydration pack is capable of holding all your important gear. It's the perfect choice for thirsty mountain bikers venturing out on the trail. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Front hydration loading and access makes it easy to refill your reservoir without taking it out of the pack. Lobo holds up to 200 cu. in. of gear; plenty of space for a multitool, an innertube, tire levers, energy bars, keys and your wallet. Bite valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, helping ensure there's no leakage during transport. XV(TM) lightweight back panel with thermomolded pods provides superior cross ventilation; ultralight mesh harness and removable webbing hipbelt offer comfort and stability. Bike-tool organizer pocket, helmet hook and stretch overflow storage help keep all your gear easily accessible. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. The CamelBak Lobo hydration pack's low-profile design enhances stability and precludes pack from interfering with the back of your helmet.
short_description: The narrow and streamlined CamelBak Lobo hydration pack is capable of holding all your important gear. It's the perfect choice for thirsty mountain bikers venturing out on the trail.
